description: This Mid Suffolk village is located near Stanton and Thornham Magna. It's in a nice rural spot with a good selection of country footpaths to explore the area. There's also two historic pubs for refreshments after your exercise. Please scroll down for the full list of walks near and around Walsham Le Willows. The detailed maps below also show a range of footpaths, bridleways and cycle paths in the area.

details.subtitle: Pubs/Cafes
details.content: The Blue Boar is an historic establishment dating back to 1420. There's a charming old interior with traditional exposed beams and open fires. There's also a nice large garden area for warmer weather. You can find them at postcode IP31 3AA. There's also the Six Bells which is housed in a 16th century thatched building .

display_address: Six Bells, Summer Road, Walsham-le-Willows, Suffolk, England, IP31 3AH, United Kingdom
